Table of Contents for current page

align-content #

align-content决定了 flex items在cross axis上的对齐方式

  • flex-start（默认值）：与cross start对齐
css
flex-flow: row wrap;
justify-content: space-evenly;

/*cross axis方向*/
align-content: flex-start;

  • flex-end：与cross end对齐
css
flex-flow: row wrap;
justify-content: space-evenly;

/*cross axis方向*/
align-content: flex-end;

  • center：居中对齐
css
flex-flow: row wrap;
justify-content: space-evenly;

/*cross axis方向*/
align-content: center;

space-between：

  • flex items之间的距离相等
  • 与cross start、cross end两端对齐
css
flex-flow: row wrap;
justify-content: space-evenly;

/*cross axis方向*/
align-content: space-between;

space-evenly：

  • flex items之间的距离相等
  • flex items与cross start、cross end之间的距离等于flex items之间的距离
css
flex-flow: row wrap;
justify-content: space-evenly;

/*cross axis方向*/
align-content: space-evenly;

  • space-around：

    • flex items之间的距离相等
    • flex items与cross start、cross end之间的距离是flex items之间的距离的一半
css
flex-flow: row wrap;
justify-content: space-evenly;

/*cross axis方向*/
align-content: space-around;
